mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CLAIM JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBERNO)
SELECT * FROM CLAIM JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBERNO) WHERE CLAIMNO=#{claimNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CLAIM SET STATUS='Y' WHERE CLAIMNO=#{claimNo}
mapper.select: select * from place join member using(MEMBERNO)
SELECT * FROM PLACE JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBERNO) WHERE PLACENO=#{placeNo}
